mapper.insert: insert into support (idx, id, email, price, addr) values (#{idx}, #{id}, #{email}, #{price}, #{addr})
mapper.update: update project set number_support=number_support+1 where idx=#{idx}

update member set support_project=#{idx} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select email from member where id=#{id};
